snippet.title: Bullet Noir | Early Access Cinematic Trailer | Wolcen Studio Indie Initiative
snippet.description:
Bullet Noir launches into Early Access on Steam on April 15th, 2025! Wishlist now: https://bit.ly/BulletNoir

Bullet Noir is a fast-paced, neo-noir top-down twin-stick shooter where you scour a gritty, urban cityscape in search for your mentor’s killer. It's the first game of Wolcen Studio’s new “Indie Initiative”, developing in-house grassroots game projects into launchable titles.

#bulletnoir
